comments:
I am running a JUnit test, which appears to be executing successfully with no errors and the execution file is created.  But after running it via right clicking my java file (GaussianIntegerRandomNumberTest.java) selectomg Run->Run As and selecting a configuration/deployment for my test, I get an error dialog and an NPE in my error log.

I am excuting the CT_JUNIT testcase:
